text: Milena Benini (November 24 1966 â€“ 4 June 2020) was a Croatian science fiction writer and translator. She won the SFERA Award six times (1999, 2006, 2010, 2012, 2016, 2017). She was born Zagreb. She wrote short stories and romantic stories. Benini died on 4 June 2020 from an illness. ==References== Category:1966 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Croatian writers Category:Translators Category:People from Zagreb
